website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, with plenty of fitting options, this has enough padding to protect users. However, it does sit a little crooked on the face.
pros: Very comfortable, with enough padding for longer sparring sessions
Fairly good peripheral vision above cheek pads
Provides good protection for the head and face
Lacing system helps headgear fit precisely
cons: Laces tend to get stuck on the Velcro tab, causing them to fray over time
Material feels stiff and uncomfortable when new
Cheek padding is not centered perfectly, causing headgear to sit crookedly for some

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Headbutted a train with this on and sent it into the netherrealms.
customer_reviews.author: ProMan

customer_reviews.title: Great face protection for confidence
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headgear for my 8 yr old daughter who is boxing. The headgear is a little stiff at first but it does an excellent job protecting her face. She has increased confidence knowing that she has that extra cheek padding versus more open faced headgear. I would definitely recommend. Fits true to size expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: -Good protection and sturdy (this goes without saying but you won't be able ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Good protection and sturdy (this goes without saying but you won't be able to see fully as you do with an open face mask). Cons: -The inside of the headgear is not leather and does leave some black lint on your face after removing -Not a con (just a precaution) but the string that ties at the top will get caught on the velcro on the back and ruin/tear the string up pretty bad though it seems replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Pham

customer_reviews.title: Price is very good and perfect fit as I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Price is very good and perfect fit as I was expecting. Your face is well protected and it gives you outstanding periferal vision. Quality material is very good and it really cushion your face when you get hit. I highly recommend this product wanting a reasonable price and outstanding protection.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Whoever gave this 5 stars obviously never got hit with a real punch
customer_reviews.text: It looks good coming out of the package, fits somewhat securely at first, but it shifts whenever you get hit with a punch at more than 30% power, and the visibility is awful. I spent half the round adjusting it. back in place so I could see. This is OK for very light sparring where you just need ANYTHING between your head and your opponent, but if you spar in serious session, please do yourself and your brain a favor and invest in something better. Don't skimp on something protecting your head.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Light sparring only! Moves easily after being hit
customer_reviews.text: Feels comfy and good quality built. However, it comes off easily due to the fact that there’s only one velcro strap in the back. Everytime I got hit, the headgear would move easily blinding me during a match. I would not recommend these. They should only be used for light sparring
customer_reviews.author: Madam Volita

customer_reviews.title: Nogo
customer_reviews.text: Kids complained that they could barely see except for straight ahead
customer_reviews.author: tito rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4yo little head. Well padded and adjustable
customer_reviews.author: JOICEE DELA CRUZ

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this helmet would be great for boxing. But I do Kung Fu. And unfortunately, the cheek protectors are a bit too big and it obstructs my view of seeing kicks. I'm going to have to buy something with less cheek padding and a clear face protector. But I do like Sanabul's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beast37

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint. Surprisingly comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Best headgear I've owned, while also being the best at the price. The headgear is super durable. The material is hard yet has a little give. Ontop of that, adjusting the headgear is super easy. Its gonna come to you super tight with the strings up top wound tight. But all you gotta do is untie it, then adjust to comfort. You can tie this however you like so long as your knot is secure.
customer_reviews.author: RJ i.

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear. I have a rather large head and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headgear. I have a rather large head and have had problems with other headgear getting knocked off by strikes. No such problems here!Very comfortable and is aesthetically gratifying.
customer_reviews.author: STyonk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: We got these for the boys for Christmas along with gloves. They just wanted gloves, but we were insistent. Now they're glad and so are we. Good protection for their faces and good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sturtevant

customer_reviews.title: Sanabul for the win
customer_reviews.text: Great shape and design. I bought this for my nephew and I am more than confident in the quality and designs of sanabul and I myself have tons of their Brazilian Jiujitsu equipment and if you're looking for fantastic gi's for a great price you cant miss!!!
customer_reviews.author: ray jaquez

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for me and my son. Im 5'6", 160lbs and my 12 yr old son is 5'3" 145 lbs. The headgear is pretty tight on me and it fits him decently. It actually best fits my 10 year old daughter, who is only 4'6". The l/xl would probably fit better but I dont see these fitting bigger guys. Other than fit, I think for the price you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting your head & face!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boys so we can protect their heads & faces while sparring & teaching them some self defense lessons. Great product for a great value. Definitely recommend this helmet!!
customer_reviews.author: B Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, I use for ASD 18 yr old who self injures his face.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 18 yr old son that is autistic and slaps his face. It is a great item for this. He can get it off, if he tries. But, that is good, I tell him if he slaps himself I will put his "mask" back on. It WORKS! The last time he smacked himself was a month ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Bb

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: Good mask for kids - it’s adjustable everywhere so it can fit small kids to adults, but the string/show lace looks like it will easily come apart because of it getting stuck in the velcro (not a big deal if your getting the gear for you alone
customer_reviews.author: jake h.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, arrived early, and affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I do kickboxing ( Muay Thai ) Good quality, arrived early, and affordable price! Thanks I am very satisfied. Just make sure you tight it good from the top so it doesn’t move on your eyes. It is recommend to do that with any headgear because that way you avoid your head bouncing inside around the headgear to prevent brain trauma.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headgear for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good protection and pretty comfortable. Vision is also pretty good out of this headgear. I definately felt like I could see out of this headgear just as good as any other gear I've worn. Just enough protection to keep from getting banged up but not to bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Protection is good but the visibility is rough the cheek pads really cuts off my peripheral vision making it hard to see hooks and even some kicks
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good protection but lopsided and cheap strings
customer_reviews.text: Great protection, alittle lopsided which makes it harder to see to one side. The strong used to hold it together on top is very cheap and I had to replace before using the first time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Amazing protection, but can feel a bit claustrophobic. Getting punched in the face leaves little impact during light sparring, but your line of vision is greatly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: J. Detec

customer_reviews.title: Sizing way smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the L/XL size and it's still way too small. Had to give it to a sparring partner. The chin piece would not reach me chin and it barely fit around my head. Definitely not an XL.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Head gear.
customer_reviews.text: The head gear arrive in good condition and it looks very nice. I gave it a 4 star because the chin area is crooked it looks funny but it should do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pino San

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Very well sized for my head shape, found it very comfortable and easy to use. Doesn't shift when taking a hit and doesn't block vision too bad for the amount of protection it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate protection
customer_reviews.text: I think this head gear is way better than anything everlast is putting out there. It offers slot more chin and jaw protection and is so thick around the mouth are no one is getting there gloves to your teeth. Don’t waste your money on that 45$ everlast junk at dicks and academy !
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been helping a couple fighters train and this headgear has saved me a few times, lol. Fits and looks good. Most importantly still has a good field of view to see kicks and punches coming. If you get hit it’ll be because you’re too slow not the headgear.
customer_reviews.author: CBeadle

customer_reviews.title: but I really like them so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a few sparring sessions with this headgear, but I really like them so far. Super comfortable fit that doesn't slip around
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good Headgear
customer_reviews.text: Good dependable product for the price. I use for kickboxing purposes and teakwondo.
customer_reviews.author: mschurma

customer_reviews.title: Great Headgear! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great headgear for both regular boxing and kickboxing. Top is adjustable with laces so it should fit perfectly if adjustments were made correctly. It’s a little hard but absorbs impact really well. Definitely recommend if you’re on a budget or would like to try headgear for the first time. (don’t be afraid to try it just because it’s priced lower than other brands)
customer_reviews.author: Xeng Xai Lee

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Cool looking
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, good padding, good vision...will feel even better when broken in
customer_reviews.author: Omar Stamp

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh
customer_reviews.text: My first and worst headgear I’ve ever worn. So uncomfortable and the detachable foam pillow really didn’t do much. It’s straight garbage
customer_reviews.author: JUICE

customer_reviews.title: Just what I’ve come to expect from Sanabul
customer_reviews.text: A little uncomfortable - but who likes to wear a pad on their face? Seems very tuff and fits well - we’ll see if I last long enough to wear it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good protection overall!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to adjust. If you’re in between sizes like me, just go with the bigger size. Fits me perfect. My hat size is 7 1/8. I do very light sparring with my friends, so this works perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: I have this ov we r a year and they are still going strong no pealing very good material
customer_reviews.author: SilentThorn

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and loss of vision isnt too bad. Haven't taken a hit yet with it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and loss of vision isnt too bad. Haven't taken a hit yet with it on but seems to be about as good as you would get out of any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barat

customer_reviews.title: Money's worth
customer_reviews.text: Fits really tight around the cheek, not sure if that's normal or not, but other than that it seems very protective all around
customer_reviews.author: Ian T. Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headgear
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to adjust the tension, but finally got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Havent got to test it yet but seems like it will work good and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Gary Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Full protection without restricting visions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend’s first Muay Thai fight and it worked great. Only recommendation is if you on competing in gear then it would definitely help if you train in it for a while to acclimate to the changes in sight lines.
customer_reviews.author: J.Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought this sooner for my kids to play around. They have a lot of fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Grotenhuis

customer_reviews.title: To each their own
customer_reviews.text: Ability to see was limited due to forehead protector being so large. Did pretty good protecting the sides though. Not a fan of chin being connected, but to each their own.
customer_reviews.author: A H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and durable. My step-sons boxing coach said this is one of the best head gear!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable; and you can feel the whole punch. Getting hit without it doesn't hurt as much as wearing it. It absorbs the impact, but you can feel the punch throughout your head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice, snug fit. Can easily see through. Adjustable velcro fit but fits a little small, so if you're uncertain go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginner boxers because it’s heavy and will cover your face well!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: He has been very pleased and item seems more durable than similar items evaluated
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 12/13 year old mma sparring. He has been very pleased and item seems more durable than similar items evaluated.
customer_reviews.author: No Public Name

customer_reviews.title: It actually stays on my head.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. You get pretty hard spars in with this headgear. Adjusts really big or really small accordingly. High quality leather and inside padding that is sweat absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas cangiamilla

customer_reviews.title: Its very small and thick.
customer_reviews.text: Got the L-XL, it was still very small for my head and very uncomfortable after i squeezed my head in. It's also very thick, which can be good for protection, but will feel uncomfortable and look weird.
customer_reviews.author: MysticSam99

customer_reviews.title: It's as good a headgear as many at twice the price
customer_reviews.text: This brand always gives me value. It's as good a headgear as many at twice the price. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: RickV

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Used this product in sparring as well as in a closed quarters fighting seminar aboard a school bus. It fit well; stayed in place, and did what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Vanhorn

customer_reviews.title: Nice brand
customer_reviews.text: The strap at the top just doesn't stay in place while sparring it flaps up n down
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Sanabul!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and durable brand as always. I have been using the head gear for a while now and still no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: fits great
customer_reviews.text: my 11 year old wears an adult size 7 1/4 hat and this medium size head gear fits his face and head perfect
customer_reviews.author: Steven K

customer_reviews.title: Very adjustable with great face protection
customer_reviews.text: Very adjustable with great face protection. Padding is a little firmer than I would prefer but overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection and quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9 year old and has room to adjust as he grows
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Got my money's worth
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's not horrible headgear it's serves its purpose but the padding in the back really makes it feel awkward on my head and it is a little bothersome but it lasted long a little uncomfortable but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice headgear.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my younger brother. He got the blue one. Fit like a glove. Still fairly new but it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Yanelle Estrada

customer_reviews.title: If your gonna fight we’re this it helps your me brains
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and it fit my head quite good when I take a shot on the money thanks
customer_reviews.author: daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, provides protection where needed and the fast delivery was awesome,Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: I bought the s/m for my 10 year old son ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the s/m for my 10 year old son MMA training. It protects him well. My only complaint is the ties at the top are awkward but maybe I'm trying them wrong. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: When I got the gear the box was opened, no rips or nothing looks very big when put on & kinda crooked but overall a great product recommend buying one from a store were u can see it in person
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: Great for sparring
customer_reviews.text: Great gear for sparring. I do Muay Thai, Kickboxing, and Boxing and this head gear works great
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hodges

customer_reviews.title: The Protection!
customer_reviews.text: The Head gear is an A+ the protection, fit and breath ability really makes it easy to train with for long period of time. Defiantly recommend getting to train in any discipline.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Another quality item from sanabul. I like how it protects the eyes by protruding out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: XquiziT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my child's large head keeps ,it safe and protected.
customer_reviews.author: David & Beth Cole

customer_reviews.title: Wear a headgear but STILL GO LIGHT TO THE HEAD!
customer_reviews.text: I get punched in the head sometimes. This makes that slightly less annoying. Excellent work Sanabul!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Norman

customer_reviews.title: Best Headgear I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the headgear. It's easy to adjust, easy to put on, really comfortable and the chin part on the bottom is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my boyfriend and I so we can spar together. The headgear does the job and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Super good headgear. I use it all the time and it holds up it’s very durable
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Boxing and kickboxing user
customer_reviews.text: Took me a week to break in but it's what I use now whenever I spar. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stormnorman

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a s/m for my 6 year old. After tightening it fits great
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. He loves it and no longer worry about taking a punch.
customer_reviews.author: Tu

customer_reviews.title: I gave 4 because the left cheek is made a ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 because the left cheek is made a lil crooked. Other than that it works for my 11 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Emveepi

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!
customer_reviews.text: It was very comfortable and easy to put on. Protects your head but just you know always block your head 😉.
customer_reviews.author: Jamil

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, one was fine, one was trash
customer_reviews.text: Order 2 headgears, one was perfect, the other one was messed up, didn’t fit snug to chin, padding is a messed up
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear for price
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for your face ans ears. Use it for MMA mostly. Kinda crooked but still gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Kal_Ehl_

customer_reviews.title: No worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Awkward, bulky and cheaply made. I should of just paid more for a some title headgear.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny O'Keith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it fits and stays put before you actually get hit
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay tight on face. Hard to fit right so it moves when sparring and doesn’t protect your face well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you measure your head and get the perfect fit. It can move around a bit but ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure your head and get the perfect fit. It can move around a bit but overall definitely a solid product, especially for the price. Fit is the only issue.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cooney

customer_reviews.title: New didn’t look new
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these to try on for size. All were ordered as NEW items. They looked used when I received them.

customer_reviews.title: Sanabul Always Pulls Through
customer_reviews.text: Great Headgear! Protects me and my guys really well and fits snug like it should! Love Sanabul and their products!

customer_reviews.title: the L/XL fit very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I have a long thin head, the L/XL fit very nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great protection at a decent price. Fits well and covers the face good.

customer_reviews.title: She said it is comfortable and fits great
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for my daughter. She said it is comfortable and fits great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I'm 6ft and 170 and L/Xl fit good.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 and 13 yr old and fits perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good, seems to be doing its job pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good , seems to be doing its job pretty well. Arrived promptly
customer_reviews.author: Mom of many

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable headgear, fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: The headgear itself is nice quality. I like how there is string at the top so you can tighten and loosen it according to your preference. The foam is nice and thick. The eye opening is smaller than I had anticipated so if you have glasses like I do this headgear is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much one size fits all
customer_reviews.text: This headgear met my expectations. Pretty much one size fits all. Head is fully protected but with just enough padding to still get the experience of knowing how it feels to actually get hit. My friends and I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald V. Carter

customer_reviews.title: every blow to me, feels as if I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: every blow to me, feels as if I didn't have anything on at all, there isn't enough inside padding

customer_reviews.text: you can feel the whole punch. i do not recommend.

product_meta.title: Sanabul Essential Professional Boxing MMA Kickboxing Head Gear
feature_bullets: Just What You Need: Sanabul Essentials checks all the boxes to get you started. Highly functional, form fitting, and a name recognized around the world. We make the key equipment with the best possible value for you

Tested By Pro's, Created For You: We challenge our Team Sanabul athletes, like UFC Champion Michael Bisping, to put our gear through their toughest training sessions. We know it’ll hold up for you, because it holds up for them
Ready For Any Sport: Essential Series Headgear provides full coverage of the face and is designed for use in any striking art from Kickboxing and MMA to Karate and Tae Kwon Do

Full Coverage: Be fearless knowing your most vital areas are protected. Superb Impact-dura shock foam absorbs the punches and kicks so you can keep sparring. Full coverage of the head, cheeks, and chin

The Perfect Fit: Other equipment can come loose from sweat and impact, blocking your vision and forcing you to stop and adjust. Our secure Hook and Loop Closure system locks into place, so you can focus on your game, not your gear. Size Guide: S/M - Head Circumference up to 22.25” L/XL - Head Circumference 22.25" and up
